original_text: The moon will hide its face in shame. The bright light of the sun will become dark. Yes, the Lord Almighty will become king on Mount Zion. He will rule with great power in Jerusalem. The leaders of the people will see his great glory. The moon will hide its face in shame. The bright light of the sun will become dark. Yes, the Lord Almighty will become king on Mount Zion. He will rule with great power in Jerusalem. The leaders of the people will see his great glory. The moon will hide its face in shame. The bright light of the sun will become dark. Yes, the Lord Almighty will become king on Mount Zion. He will rule with great power in Jerusalem. The leaders of the people will see his great glory.
korean_text: 그 때에 달이 수치를 당하고 해가 부끄러워하리니 이는 만군의 여호와께서 시온 산과 예루살렘에서 왕이 되시고 그 장로들 앞에서 영광을 나타내실 것임이라

sentences.original_text: The moon will hide its face in shame.
sentences.korean_translation: 달은 수치로 그 얼굴을 가릴 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: The bright light of the sun will become dark.
Yes, the Lord Almighty will become king
sentences.korean_translation: 그래요, 전능하신 주께서 왕이 되실 것입니다.

sentences.original_text: on Mount Zion.
He will rule with great power
in Jerusalem.
The leaders of the people will see
his great glory.
